cardinfo.CI: Bauhinia - Red Orchid Tree/Red Orchid Tree - Canopy.jpg

V: Bauhinia galpinii (also known as Red Orchid Bush)[1] is a species of shrubs from Fabaceae family that originated in South Africa[2] but is in cultivation throughout the warm zones of the United States and Mexico where it has escaped cultivation in some locations. The species have brick red colour, and a hooved shaped petals.[2] Some species though, can be of pink or orange-red coloured.[1] The shrub grows in summer, and can exceed the growth of up to 20–25 feet (6.1–7.6 m).
